text: Jan Hampel (25 April 1933 – 3 December 1962), was a Polish former ice hockey player. He played for GKS Katowice during his career. He also played for the Polish national team at the 1952 Winter Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1933 births Category:1975 deaths Category:GKS Katowice (ice hockey) players Category:Ice hockey players at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Poland Category:Polish ice hockey goaltenders Category:Sportspeople from Katowice
title: Jan Hampel
